title: Self-Supervised Content-Consistent Contrast Enhancement Framework for Ultrafast Plane-Wave Imaging
details: A Wang, J Lu, Z Yang, W Liang, H Zhuang, Y Zhang - IEEE Transactions on …, 2024
abstract: Ultrafast ultrasound imaging based on plane waves (PWs) has attracted increasing attention owing to its high frame rate. However, the image quality provided by this technology, particularly in image contrast, does not meet clinical standards. Although …
